entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
